an_read2joint_states.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 /*
2  * playback_joint_states.cpp
3  * Implements playback recorded files from real robot to joint state publisher in the model
4  * Created on: 2015-03-03
5  * Author: Vinicius (vncprado@gmail.com)
6  */
7 
8 #include "ros/ros.h"
9 #include <sensor_msgs/JointState.h>
10 #include <urdf/model.h>
11 #include "yaml-cpp/yaml.h"
12 
13 
14 double map2joint_states(YAML::Node servo,
15  boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>::element_type* joint,
16  std::vector<uint16_t> an_read) {
17 
18  //ROS_INFO("%s", joint->name.c_str());
19 
20  int in_min = servo["arduino"]["analog_read_min"].as<uint16_t>();
21  int in_max = servo["arduino"]["analog_read_max"].as<uint16_t>();
22  double out_min = joint->limits->lower;
23  double out_max = joint->limits->upper;
24  int pin = servo["arduino"]["pin"].as<int>();
25 
26  //ROS_INFO("%d %d %f %f %d", in_min, in_max, out_min, out_max, pin);
27 
28  if (pin > an_read.size())
29  return 0;
30  if ((in_max - in_min) == 0)
31  return 0;
32  double pos = (double) ((an_read[pin] - in_min) * (out_max - out_min)
33  / (in_max - in_min) + out_min);
34 
35  //ROS_INFO("%f", pos);
36 
37  if (pos > out_max)
38  return out_max;
39  if (pos < out_min)
40  return out_min;
41  else
42  return pos;
43 }
44 
45 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
46 
47  ros::init(argc, argv, "playback_joint_states");
48  ros::NodeHandle nh;
49  ros::Publisher joint_pub = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::JointState>("playback_joint_states", 1);
50  ros::Subscriber arduino_data = nh.subscribe
51 
52  // TODO Instead of input_file it must receive from an_read topic
53  std::string input_file, input_config_calib, input_urdf;
54  if (argc >= 4) {
55  input_config_calib = argv[1];
56  input_urdf = argv[2];
57  input_file = argv[3];
58  } else {
59  printf("Usage: rosrun pumpkin playback_joint_states <input_config_calib> <input_urdf> <input_file>\n");
60  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse input files");
61  exit(-1);
62  }
63 
64  YAML::Node pumpkin_config = YAML::LoadFile(input_config_calib);
65  std::vector<YAML::Node> reads = YAML::LoadAllFromFile(input_file);
66 
67  double ros_rate = pumpkin_config["ros_rate"].as<double>();
68  ros::Rate loop_rate(ros_rate);
69 
70  urdf::Model model;
71  if (!model.initFile(input_urdf)) {
72  ROS_ERROR("Failed to parse urdf file");
73  exit(-1);
74  }
75  ROS_INFO("Successfully parsed urdf file");
76 
77  std::vector<YAML::Node> servos;
78 
79  typedef std::map<std::string, boost::shared_ptr<urdf::Joint> > UrdfJoints;
80 
81  UrdfJoints::const_iterator joint_it = model.joints_.begin();
82  UrdfJoints::const_iterator joint_end = model.joints_.end();
83  std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>::element_type*> joints;
84  for (; joint_it != joint_end; ++joint_it) {
85  const boost::shared_ptr<const urdf::Joint>& urdf_joint =
86  joint_it->second;
87  if (urdf_joint->type == 1) { all servo joints are revolute
88  if (urdf_joint->name[0] == 'r') {
89  std::string joint_name = urdf_joint->name;
90  servos.push_back(
91  pumpkin_config["right_arm"][joint_name.substr(
92  joint_name.find_first_of('_') + 1).c_str()]);
93  joints.push_back(urdf_joint.get());
94  }
95  if (urdf_joint->name[0] == 'l') {
96  std::string joint_name = urdf_joint->name;
97  servos.push_back(
98  pumpkin_config["left_arm"][joint_name.substr(
99  joint_name.find_first_of('_') + 1).c_str()]);
100  joints.push_back(urdf_joint.get());
101  }
102  }
103  }
104 
105  for (int r = 0; r < reads.size(); r++) {
106  sensor_msgs::JointState joint_state;
107  if (!reads[r].IsNull() && ros::ok()) {
108  if (reads[r]["an_read"].IsNull())
109  ROS_FATAL("NULL");
110  std::vector<uint16_t> an_read = reads[r]["an_read"].as<
111  std::vector<uint16_t> >();
112  std::ostringstream stringStream;
113  for (int i = 0; i < reads[r]["an_read"].size(); i++) {
114  double pos = map2joint_states(servos[i], joints[i], an_read);
115  joint_state.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
116  joint_state.name.push_back(joints[i]->name.c_str());
117  joint_state.position.push_back(pos);
118 
119  joint_pub.publish(joint_state);
120 
121  }
122  }
123  ros::spinOnce();
124  loop_rate.sleep();
125  }
126 
127  return 0;
128 }
